main.name: Ajay Kumar
main.description: I like to make pretty things with React
main.bio: Hi there ! I am Ajay ! You might also know me as React Developer. I've been coding for over 3 years now. As a Front-end developer I've worked both with startups and as well as Freelancing to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers. I deliver REAL VALUE & REAL WORLD projects to help my Users to enter the Seemless world of web development. Iâ€™ll get hands-on my experience and learn the skills that are required to succeed in the real-world in this community.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of my journey!

work.title: SDE
work.description: As a passionate frontend developer at Epek Software Solutions since April 2022, I have consistently delivered high-quality software solutions, leveraging my proficiency in HTML/CSS, TailwindCSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, React.Js, and Next.Js. My technical expertise extends to utilizing ContextApi, Hooks, and Redux/Toolkit for improved code efficiency and functionality, along with a solid understanding of MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js, and JavaScript OOPs for backend development. I am experienced in using Git/GitHub, Webpack, and VS Code for efficient version control, and development environment setup. With over three years of demonstrated expertise in software development, I adhere to industry-standard code practices to ensure code quality, scalability, and maintainability. Additionally, I possess strong teamwork and communication skills, committed to delivering high-quality code and collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams. I am now seeking new opportunities to contribute and grow in a dynamic work environment.

testimonials.text: Ajay is absolutely excellent person, his dedication for learning and skill-up knowledge really meant a lot to us...
Learning with Ajay has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
